title: Elegant Lakshmi Kasu Mangalsutra - A Timeless Token of Love
materials: featuring high-quality Black Onyx beads. The Lakshmi Kasu pendants are adorned with dazzling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones.
features: This exquisite mangalsutra showcases a delicate strand of black onyx beads interspersed with 18k rose gold accents. The centerpiece is a series of meticulously crafted Lakshmi Kasu pendants, each showcasing a finely detailed depiction of the Goddess Lakshmi, set with shimmering Cubic Zirconia stones. The piece boasts a modern take on traditional kasu mala designs.
colors: with the brilliance of clear Cubic Zirconia stones adding a touch of sparkle. The rose gold provides a warm
contemporary contrast to the classic black beads.
occasions: Perfect for daily wear or special occasions
from traditional Telugu weddings (Pendli) and festivals like Diwali or Ugadi
to modern events and anniversaries. A cherished gift for brides (vadhu) and married women (sumangali).
description: This mangalsutra seamlessly blends tradition with contemporary design. The Lakshmi Kasu pendants bring auspicious blessings, while the rose gold and CZ stones offer a modern touch. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear, this piece is a durable and meaningful symbol of love and commitment. The intricate details showcase exceptional craftsmanship, making it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection.
